name: groupdocs/groupdocs-comparison
description: The GroupDocs.Comparison for Cloud plugin for SilverStripe allows you to embed and compare two Word documents, as well as PDF files and Excel spreadsheets, from within your website. GroupDocs.Comparison is a web-based app that lets you compare documents online using a browser. Simply upload two Word documents and let GroupDocs.Comparison find the difference between them. It even allows you to merge the differences and export the document to a Word file!
